pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dash_cm## Install```bashpip install --upgrade dash_cm```Optionally:```bashsudo tee /usr/local/bin/dashcm > /dev/null <<EOT#!/usr/bin/bashexec "python" -m dash_cm "\$@"EOTsudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/dashcm```And then use as executable```bashdashcm serve &```To check used ports:`netstat -tulpn | grep LISTEN |grep 3000`## Make '.model' file executableCreate the two following files:- `/usr/share/mime/packages/cardiac-model.xml` ``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <mime-info xmlns="https://www.freedesktop.org/standards/shared-mime-info"> <mime-type type="application/zip"> <comment xml:lang="en">Cardiac Model</comment> <glob pattern="*.model"/> <glob pattern="*.zip"/> </mime-type> </mime-info> ```- `/usr/share/applications/cardiac-model.desktop` ``` [Desktop Entry] Encoding=UTF-8 Version=1.0 Type=Application Terminal=true Exec=dashcm load %F Name=CardiacModel Icon=<path-to>/dash_cm/build/static/icons/logo_512.png ```
